text: @GovAndyBeshear @GovAndyBeshear Your policy on covid19 shutdown ky.  My wife has lost her job, she doesn't have insurance & cannot get her medications. We have been trying for 3 weeks to get unemployment. How exactly is this helping Ky?  The cure is worse than the disease  You are not helping!
